levels.description:
On deployment, view a random selection of <@ba.vup>{range_num}</> units from the <@ba.vup>Preparation Area</> and select <@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}</> units to be removed (will not appear again in this battle) and converted into <@ba.vup>{sell_card_gold}</> Transfer Permits.
<@ba.rem>After activation, this unit disappears (will not appear again in this battle)</>
